titleInfo.title: Map of the Masandam Peninsula by Bertram Thomas

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with crayon on paperDimensions:326 x 208 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:The Trucial Chiefs' territories shown in colour with ports labelled and underlined accordingly, and a key provided in the upper-right hand corner.Includes descriptive notes on territories and their rulers with a table listing Sheikhsâ€™ names and their residences in the lower part of the sheet.
